transcript: the big underlying problem with the majority of the influencer world if somebody gets online and wants to talk about growing your social media F and you see that they have 500 followers on Instagram I don't need to listen to what they're saying to know that they don't know what they're talking about the hard work is in accumulating the undeniable stack of evidence that you are who you say you are and the first person you have to convince is you because if you sell you because you know what you did to get here then everyone else's opinion just doesn't matter
